Title: FacebookSharp
Description:
FacebookSharp library for ASP.NET WebForms, ASP.NET MVC, Silverlight, Windows Phone 7 and desktop apps (client profile supported too.)

Supports both .net 3.5 and .net 4.0. Incase you are using under .net 4.0 you get access to dynamic objects.
HomeWiki:
FacebookSharp is no longer under development. Please use Facebook C# SDK instead which is actively maintained.

Project Description
FacebookSharp library for ASP.NET WebForms, ASP.NET MVC, Silverlight, Windows Phone 7 and desktop apps (client profile supported too.)

Supports both .net 3.5 and .net 4.0. Incase you are using under .net 4.0 you get access to dynamic objects.


Source Code has been moved to http://github.com/prabirshrestha/facebooksharp or http://bit.ly/facebooksharp
Codeplex only contains binaries. Nightly builds can be download from Continuous Integration Server (provided by http://codebetter.com)

You can follow me on twitter at http://twitter.com/facebooksharp or http://twitter.com/prabirshrestha
TagList: Facebook,Facebook API,Facebook Graph API,facebook .net,facebook connect,Facebook Toolkit,Facebook Canvas App,
